Keep the ball away from the defenders for as long as possible.

Controls

  • Use 'A' to jog left.
  • Use 'D' to jog right.
  • Use 'S' to jog down.
  • Use 'W' to jog up.
  • Use the space bar to bring the ball to a stop.
  • Use 'J' to sprint left.
  • Use 'L' to sprint right.
  • Use 'K' to sprint down.
  • Use 'I" to sprint up.
  • Use the space bar to bring the ball to a stop.
vs.
